mixtime 0.0.0.9000

Extract timezone from an object

Source: R/timezone.R
tz_name.Rd

Generic function to extract the timezone from objects that have timezone information.

Usage

tz_name(x, ...)

Arguments

x

An object with timezone information.

...

Additional arguments passed to methods.

Value

A character string representing the timezone (e.g., "America/New_York", "UTC").

Examples

tz_name(Sys.time())
#> [1] "UTC"
tz_name(as.POSIXct("2024-06-15 12:00:00", tz = "America/New_York"))
#> [1] "America/New_York"
